Package clinic

Class Appointment

java.lang.Object
clinic.Appointment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Appointment>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Imaging
public class Appointment extends Object implements Comparable<Appointment>
Class contains information about a patient's appointment, including provider, time, and date
Author:
Angel Vargas, Max Trofimchuk

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Appointment appointment)
      compares two appointment objects
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Appointment>
      Parameters:
      appointment - the object to be compared.
      Returns:
      returns 1 if appointment is greater than other based on date/time/profile, -1 if less than, and 0 if equal
